description: A utility module providing a custom render function for testing React components with React Router and context providers, specifically for use with React Testing Library. It helps avoid browser-specific limitations by using a memory router and ensures global providers are included.

methods.name: renderWithRouter( element, { initialEntries = ["/"],  routes, } = {} )
methods.description: A function that renders a React element wrapped in a memory router and global providers, with optional custom routes and initial entries for testing React Router navigation behaviors.
